New Records: Heinrich Klaasen scored the second-quickest hundred in this World Cup tournament
South Africa scored the second-highest total in the tournament
Key Match Events: England fell to 4-38 after 8.1 overs in its reply
Klaasen hit his first World Cup hundred
England was dismissed for 170 in only 22 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's loss leaves them second last on the table, ahead of only Afghanistan
Others: England still has to play current top four teams India and Australia in the run home
South Africa bounced back from their own surprising loss to the Netherlands
